name: Letters Terrorize Game Developer!!!
description:
This is my submission for the 2022 Let's Talk Game Design: Let's Talk Game Jam (also my first game jam)

The only theme for this jam was to name your game using the initials L T G D. I took it a little farther and made the letters L T G D the game's enemies. You must defeat all 4 Terrorizing Letters without taking a hit from one of them to clear the level.
